org.opentcs.util.eventsystem

Interface EventSource<E extends Event>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The actual event implementation.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Kernel, KernelProxy, LocalKernel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsynchronousEventHub, EventHub, SynchronousEventHub

    public interface EventSource<E extends Event>
    This interface declares methods for registering and unregistering event listeners with a source of events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEventListener(EventListener<E> listener)
      Registers an event listener.
      void addEventListener(EventListener<E> listener, EventFilter<E> filter)
      Deprecated. 
      Use addEventListener(org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventListener) instead, and filter out unwanted events in EventListener.processEvent(org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.Event). (Note that you should do that, anyway, which is why a separate event filter is superfluous.)
      void removeEventListener(EventListener<E> listener)
      Unregisters an event listener.

    • Method Detail

      • addEventListener

        @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
void addEventListener(EventListener<E> listener,
                                                                                                                      EventFilter<E> filter)
        Deprecated. Use addEventListener(org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventListener) instead, and filter out unwanted events in EventListener.processEvent(org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.Event). (Note that you should do that, anyway, which is why a separate event filter is superfluous.)
        Registers an event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The event listener to add. If the listener is already registered, it is re-registered with the given event filter.
        filter - The filter deciding which events to deliver to the given listener.

      • addEventListener

        void addEventListener(EventListener<E> listener)
        Registers an event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The event listener to add.

      • removeEventListener

        void removeEventListener(EventListener<E> listener)
        Unregisters an event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove. If no such listener is registered, nothing happens.
